dialogs.text: What'd they say? Where's my pencil? Did you find it?

choices.text: One said the girl in blue took it and the other said it was your roommate.

dialogs.text: RevealResults03 There's a good chance someone remembered wrong. That's a little scary for a courtroom setting. Good thing I'm just a slug!
So is that all you know? Which one took my pencil?

choices.text: I don't know, give me more time.

dialogs.text: Ok, if that's what you think. As long as I get my pencil back.
I don't have all the time in the world. Hurry up.
Really? Then I gotta give you my ID card. Don't you dare do something sneaky with it. And maybe teach my roommate a thing or two.

NewImage00 I learned deception cues in my studies, too! Short sentences and speech errors may be signs of a liar, but a long response time and fidgeting are not. I wonder why your pink-haired friend was lying.
